title: A Chilean Odyssey by SCOR – Ep.3, It’s a Wrap
content:
From SCOR: “After two weeks of having their minds blown by Chile’s incredible riding, scenery, and people, the SCOR crew arrives at the final stop on their South American tour: Huilo Huilo. Keen to make the most of everything the area has to offer, Josh Lewis and Ludo May hit up El Traro bike park in the morning, with a blast down a volcanic glacier in the afternoon. From pumptrack tricks and hero-dirt turns to high altitudes, high winds, and high fives, the riding (and maté) leave Ludo buzzing and bring a tear to Josh’s eye. The perfect way to sign off from SCOR’s Chilean Odyssey.”
